Question
========

In the figure below, the Y-axis shows the bivariate correlation between Y and $X_{1}$. The X axis shows the partial correlation between Y and $X_{1}$, controlled for $X_{2}$. The dot in the figure represents this correlation for a specific data set. What multivariate relationship is involved here?

![](vufgb-mediation-012-en-figure01.jpg) 
Answerlist
----------
* Suppressor effect
* Full mediation
* Partial confounding
* No relationship between Y and $X_{1}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
